import './ExpenseForm.css' import {useState} from 'react' const ExpenseForm=()=>{ const[enteredTitle, setEnteredTitle]=useState(''); const onChangeTitle=(event)=>{ setEnteredTitle(event.target.value) console.log(enteredTitle) } const[enteredAmount, setEnteredAmount]=useState(''); const onChangeAmount=(event)=>{ setEnteredAmount(event.target.value) console.log(enteredAmount) } const[enteredDate, setenteredDate]=useState(''); const onChangeDate=(event)=>{ setEnteredDate(event.target.value) console.log(enteredDate) } return(
) } export default ExpenseForm
